    • initPlanningOrder

      private List<String> initPlanningOrder(String firstPlayer, List<String> playerList)
      method that returns the initial planning order of one round given a list of player names and the name of the first player
      Parameters:
      firstPlayer - name of the first player
      playerList - ordered list of players names
      Returns:
      a list of player names where firstPlayer is set as first element of the list and the order of the others players is preserved (maintains clockwise order)

    • setNextPlayer

      public void setNextPlayer(Map<String,Player> playerMap)
      sets the next player for the round considering the phase
      Parameters:
      playerMap - map (playerName,Player) used for setting the currentPlayer

    • setNextPlanningTurn

      private String setNextPlanningTurn()
      if the Planning phase is ended and Action phase starts
      Returns:
      the next playerName when we are in planning phase

    • setActionPhase

      private String setActionPhase()
      Set action phase actionOrder is sorted at the start of the method currentPhase is set to ACTION
      Returns:
      name of the first player in the Action phase

    • setNextActionTurn

      private String setNextActionTurn()
      actionOrder list is gradually reduced popping an element each time the function is called
      Returns:
      next playerName when we are in Action phase

    • updateWithPlayedAssistant

      public void updateWithPlayedAssistant(AssistantCard assistantCard)
      updates current round actionOrder with the card played by the current player
      Parameters:
      assistantCard - card played by currentPlayer

    • updateActionOrder

      private void updateActionOrder(AssistantCard card)
      updates actionOrder adding a new OrderElement if the card has been already played by another player the new OrderElement is marked with playsSecond = true
      Parameters:
      card - played card

    • getPlayedAssistants

      public List<Integer> getPlayedAssistants()
      Method to get already played assistant cards
      Returns:
      the list of assistant cards(Ids) played during this round

    • initNextRound

      public Round initNextRound(Map<String,Player> playerMap)
      initialize and return the next round
      Parameters:
      playerMap - map (playerName, Player)
      Returns:
      the new round

    • isEnded

      public boolean isEnded()
      Method to check if round is finished
      Returns:
      true if the current player is the last player of this round

    • getCurrentRuleSet

      public RuleSet getCurrentRuleSet()

    • excludeTowersFromInfluence

      public boolean excludeTowersFromInfluence()
      used for influence calculation, checks the current ruleSet applied to the currentPlayer's turn
      Returns:
      true if towers are excluded from influence calculation (character's effect)

    • sumAdditionalInfluence

      public Map<TowerColour,Integer> sumAdditionalInfluence(Map<TowerColour,Integer> playerInfluenceMap)
      used for influence calculation, increases the current player's influence
      Parameters:
      playerInfluenceMap - map representing the influence points associated to each player
      Returns:
      the same map received as parameter,where the current player's influence is increased by the value expected by the current ruleSet

    • checkProfessorAssignment

      public boolean checkProfessorAssignment(Integer studentCount, int professorCount)
      Method to check professor assignment
      Parameters:
      studentCount - students to check
      professorCount - professor count
      Returns:
      true if the professor is assigned

    • getPlayableAssistants

      public Set<Integer> getPlayableAssistants()
      returns the assistants that can be played by the current player. They are obtained by subtracting the cards played by other players during this round to the cards owned by the player
      Returns:
      a set of cardIds representing the playable cards
